entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
